verbose_text: To further confirm whether Stat6 deficiency attenuates aberrant airway inflammation and Th2 and Th9 responses in vivo, we immunized WT, Cblb -/-, Stat6 -/-, and Cblb -/- Stat6 -/- mice with OVA in alum.
evidence: attenuates aberrant airway inflammation and Th2 and Th9 responses in vivo, we immunized WT, Cblb -/- , Stat6 -/- , and Cblb -/- Stat6 -/-  mice with OVA in alum
